data.description:
Based on ASUâ€™s Mars Space Flight Facility JMARS GIS tool, Planetary Parfait is designed to support a wide range of scientific research tasks, including geologic mapping, feature analysis, and mission planning. The platform includes a variety of tools and features to support these tasks, such as 3D visualization, annotation tools, and data layers that can be overlaid on top of the terrain data. It is intended to be used by researchers and scientists working in fields such as planetary geology, geography, and geophysics, as well as by educators and students interested in learning about planetary science.

For more information about creating custom terrains, please visit our website: https://meteor.ame.asu.edu/jmars/

Privacy Policy: https://meteor.ame.asu.edu/projects/jmars-xr/privacypolicy.html

changelog.change_log:
- Multiuser supports cross-platform: VR and Desktop players can join same room
- Host terrain layers and exaggeration synced across multiuser
- Client can change layers locally in multiuser
- Client can place and delete pins globally in multiuser. Host can delete all pins
- Patched bugs related to terrain and multiuser

- Multiuser supports cross-platform: VR and Desktop players can join same room
- Host terrain layers and exaggeration synced across multiuser
- Client can change layers locally in multiuser
- Client can place and delete pins globally in multiuser. Host can delete all pins
- Patched bugs related to terrain and multiuser

- Multiuser

- Pins

- Host / Client Setup

- Refresh Terrains

- Reset Platform

- Exaggeration

- New UI
New user interface and dynamic exaggeration features
